BadgeDetail.Name: Sports Guru
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has applied their skills and knowledge practically in a real life environment to enhance the performance of an athlete in a team or a participant in an exercise environment.

Task.Title: Performance Enhancing MP4
Task.Body: Upload the supporting documentation used to enhance the performance of an individual, along with evidence of the improvements made and a 1 minute video of the individual explaining how you have helped them.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload the supporting documentation used to enhance the performance of an individual, along with evidence of the improvements made and a 1 minute video of the individual explaining how you have helped them.
